content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Zero Trust Secure Access On-premises Gateway Version 1.0.51 September 9, 2024—ZTSA On-Premises Gateway Version 1.0.51 provides enhanced security and connectivity features. This update includes the following changes: Enhancement Updated the IP geolocation database to the latest version. Fixed the issue where the HTTPS connection with the TLS handshake could fail in some situations. © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base
